title: LSE Climate and Political Behaviour Workshop 2026
body: I was pleased to attend and present at the LSE Climate and Political Behaviour Workshop 2026.

title: Paper on parties' responsiveness accepted at West European Politics
body_html: My paper with Lukas F. Stoetzer and Heike Kl√ºver "Parties' issue responsiveness between elections" has been accepted for publication at West European Politics.

title: LSE Seed Research Fund
body_html: Received LSE Seed Research Fund (with Zachary P. Dickson) for joint project on party press releases (GBP 9,600).

title: Paper on tailoring of political advertising accepted at The Journal of Politics
body_html: My paper "Gendered targeting: Do parties tailor their campaign ads to women?" has been accepted for publication at The Journal of Politics.
